member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.HidD_GetHidGuid(System.Guid@)
member.summary: 获得GUID The HidD_GetHidGuid routine returns the device interface GUID for HIDClass devices.
member.param: a caller-allocated GUID buffer that the routine uses to return the device interface GUID for HIDClass devices.

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.SetupDiGetClassDevs(System.Guid@,System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,ADSDK.Device.DIGCF)
member.summary: 过滤设备，获取需要的设备 The SetupDiGetClassDevs function returns a handle to a device information set that contains requested device information elements for a local machine.
member.param: GUID for a device setup class or a device interface class.
A pointer to a NULL-terminated string that supplies the name of a PnP enumerator or a PnP device instance identifier.
A handle of the top-level window to be used for a user interface
A variable that specifies control options that filter the device information elements that are added to the device information set.
member.returns: a handle to a device information set

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.SetupDiDestroyDeviceInfoList(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: The SetupDiDestroyDeviceInfoList function deletes a device information set and frees all associated memory.
member.param: A handle to the device information set to delete.
member.returns: returns TRUE if it is successful. Otherwise, it returns FALSE

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Guid@,System.UInt32,ADSDK.Device.SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA@)
member.summary: 获取设备，true获取到 The SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces function enumerates the device interfaces that are contained in a device information set.
member.param: A pointer to a device information set that contains the device interfaces for which to return information
A pointer to an SP_DEVINFO_DATA structure that specifies a device information element in DeviceInfoSet
a GUID that specifies the device interface class for the requested interface
A zero-based index into the list of interfaces in the device information set
a caller-allocated buffer that contains a completed SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA structure that identifies an interface that meets the search parameters

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.SetupDiGetDeviceInterfaceDetail(System.IntPtr,ADSDK.Device.SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA@,System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32@,ADSDK.Device.SP_DEVINFO_DATA@)
member.summary: 获取接口的详细信息 必须调用两次 第1次返回长度 第2次获取数据 The SetupDiGetDeviceInterfaceDetail function returns details about a device interface.
member.param: A pointer to the device information set that contains the interface for which to retrieve details
A pointer to an SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DATA structure that specifies the interface in DeviceInfoSet for which to retrieve details
A pointer to an SP_DEVICE_INTERFACE_DETAIL_DATA structure to receive information about the specified interface
The size of the DeviceInterfaceDetailData buffer
A pointer to a variable that receives the required size of the DeviceInterfaceDetailData buffer
A pointer buffer to receive information about the device that supports the requested interface

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.HidD_GetAttributes(System.IntPtr,ADSDK.Device.HIDD_ATTRIBUTES@)
member.summary: The HidD_GetAttributes routine returns the attributes of a specified top-level collection.
member.param: Specifies an open handle to a top-level collection
a caller-allocated HIDD_ATTRIBUTES structure that returns the attributes of the collection specified by HidDeviceObject

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.HidD_GetSerialNumberString(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: The HidD_GetSerialNumberString routine returns the embedded string of a top-level collection that identifies the serial number of the collection's physical device.
member.param: Specifies an open handle to a top-level collection
a caller-allocated buffer that the routine uses to return the requested serial number string
Specifies the length, in bytes, of a caller-allocated buffer provided at Buffer

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.HidD_GetPreparsedData(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: The HidD_GetPreparsedData routine returns a top-level collection's preparsed data.
member.param: Specifies an open handle to a top-level collection.
Pointer to the address of a routine-allocated buffer that contains a collection's preparsed data in a _HIDP_PREPARSED_DATA structure.
member.returns: HidD_GetPreparsedData returns TRUE if it succeeds; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.CreateFile(System.String,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: 获取设备文件 This function creates, opens, or truncates a file, COM port, device, service, or console.
member.param: a null-terminated string that specifies the name of the object
Type of access to the object
Action to take on files that exist, and which action to take when files do not exist
File attributes and flags for the file
member.returns: An open handle to the specified file indicates success

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.CloseHandle(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 关闭访问设备句柄，结束进程的时候把这个加上保险点 This function closes an open object handle.

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.ReadFile(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 读取设备文件 This function reads data from a file, starting at the position indicated by the file pointer.
member.param: Handle to the file to be read
Pointer to the buffer that receives the data read from the file
Number of bytes to be read from the file
Pointer to the number of bytes read

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.WriteFile(System.IntPtr,System.Byte[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32@,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: This function writes data to a file
member.param: Handle to the file to be written to
Pointer to the buffer containing the data to write to the file
Number of bytes to write to the file
Pointer to the number of bytes written by this function call

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.RegisterDeviceNotification(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Registers the device or type of device for which a window will receive notifications
member.param: A handle to the window or service that will receive device events for the devices specified in the NotificationFilter parameter
A pointer to a block of data that specifies the type of device for which notifications should be sent
A Flags that specify the handle type
member.returns: If the function succeeds, the return value is a device notification handle

member.name: M:ADSDK.Device.Hid.UnregisterDeviceNotification(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Closes the specified device notification handle.
member.param: Device notification handle returned by the RegisterDeviceNotification function
